publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-5852.2 Jamie McGrigor: Regeneration—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5852) in the name of Alex Neil, insert at end "; acknowledges the success of the New Life for Urban Scotland initiative focused on Castlemilk, Ferguslie Park, Wester Hailes and Whitfield and described as a landmark in the history of urban regeneration in Scotland in the official assessment of the scheme, and welcomes the £60 million Town Centre Regeneration Fund secured in the 2009 budget."
